wikipedia_page.main: Laurence Temple Bond (31 December 1905 – 1 December 1943) was a British athlete. He competed in the men's pole vault at the 1928 Summer Olympics. He also competed in the pole vault at the 1930 British Empire Games for England.He was also a medical student at the time of the 1930 Games.
